      • findMatchingCell

        @DomainSpecific
private TableContentOverrideManager.CellID findMatchingCell(int indexOfRowContainingArrow,
                                                                            int absoluteOffset)
        Find a table column which spans over (includes) the given offset
        Parameters:
        indexOfRowContainingArrow - index of the row (0-based) which contains the visual representation of the arrow
        absoluteOffset - offset in twips measured from the left edge of the leftmost column of the table
        Returns:
        ID of the cell which includes the given offset

      • findMatchingRow

        @DomainSpecific
private int findMatchingRow(int absoluteOffset)
        Find a table row which spans over (includes) the given offset
        Parameters:
        absoluteOffset - offset in twips measured from the top edge of the first row of the table
        Returns:
        index of the row which includes the given offset (0-based)
